description: Bugleweed (Ajuga reptans 'Toffee Chip') is an amazing plant for a variety of reasons. Its stunning foliage displays multi-colored shades of bronze, silver, and burgundy that are sure to be a show-stopper in any garden setting. Not only is it attractive, it is also fast growing, drought tolerant, and deer resistant. This low maintenance beauty is perfect for ground cover and even works in combination with other plants to provide a unique look that is sure to turn heads. Furthermore, its use in erosion control provides an extra layer of tranquility in gardens. Bugleweedâ€™s awesome features ensure that it is the perfect addition to any landscape design.
